flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It carries a round, egg-shaped
rock in its belly pouch and gives
the rock to its friends.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It likes to carry around a small
rock. It may wander around others’
feet and cause them to stumble.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It carefully carries a round, white rock
that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered
by how curly its hair looks.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
It carefully carries a round, white rock
that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered
by how curly its hair looks.

flavor_text_entries.x:

flavor_text_entries.y:

is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly
pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks
is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
It carries a round white rock in its belly pouch.
If it gets along well with someone, it will
sometimes give that person the rock.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
It’s too small to lay eggs yet. As a surrogate,
it searches out round white stones.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
Usually it’s a well-behaved Pokémon, but if you
take its round rock away, it will cry and fuss
and throw a big old tantrum.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
When it sees something round and white,
Happiny puts it into the pouch on its stomach. It
sometimes becomes overloaded and can’t move.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Mimicking Chansey, Happiny will place an egg-
shaped stone in its belly pouch. Happiny will
treasure this stone.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Happiny’s willing to lend its precious round stone
to those it’s friendly with, but if the stone isn’t
returned, Happiny will cry and throw a tantrum.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
In imitation of Chansey, it keeps a round stone tucked into its
belly pouch and cherishes it dearly. It gets along well with
children and will sometimes play house with them for fun.
